textContent:
gcloud builds submit  --tag gcr.io/$GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT/authv502

The command builds a container with your code and puts it in the Container Registry of your project.


gcloud beta run services describe pdf-converter --platform managed --region us-east1 --format="value(status.url)"
pour obtenir l'url 

curl -X POST -H "Authorization: Bearer $(gcloud auth print-identity-token)" $SERVICE_URL
title: Cloud Run
textContentHtml:
gcloud builds submit  --tag gcr.io/$GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT/authv502


The command builds a container with your code and puts it in the Container Registry of your project.



gcloud beta run services describe pdf-converter --platform managed --region us-east1 --format="value(status.url)"

pour obtenir l'url 


curl -X POST -H "Authorization: Bearer $(gcloud auth print-identity-token)" $SERVICE_URL
